title: Starburst font
content:
Hey does anybody know the font used for the starburst candy logo?   
   
check it out... [www.starburst.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130101064650/http:/www.starburst.com/)   
if anybody knows - i'm also looking for the skittles font if anybody knows it too...   
 [www.skittles.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130101064650/http:/www.skittles.com/)   
   
thanks guys
author: dangerboy

comments.content:
Well, the Skittles logo looks like a slightly modified version of [Helvetica Neue Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20130101064650/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/helvetica-96-black-italic/testdrive.html?s=Skittles&p=48) (the bar on the e is pretty thin, but the other letters look extremely close to me).   
   
Not sure about Starburst -- it looks like it shouldn't be too hard to id, though, doesn't it?
